summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 3, Brooklyn Addition, from East 43rd Street to East 45th Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 90354, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
